mapper.select:
select device,newcount,launchcount from ( select resolution as device,sum(new_user_count) as newcount,sum(launch_user_count) as launchcount FROM la_resolution_stat
date >='${date1}'
AND date <='${date2}'
AND appid=${appid}
group by resolution )a order by launchcount desc

select device,newcount,launchcount from ( select resolution as device,sum(new_user_count) as newcount,sum(launch_user_count) as launchcount FROM la_resolution_stat
date >='${date1}'
AND date <='${date2}'
AND appid=${appid}
group by resolution )a order by newcount desc limit 10
